chapter.title: Installing CoffeePot
chapter.para: The simplest way to install CoffeePot is to download the latest release zip file from . Unzipping that somewhere on your system will result in a directory that contains a jar file and a few ancillary files. You can run CoffeePot directly from the jar file.
